org.apache.sis.util.iso

Class AbstractFactory

  • Object
    • AbstractFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Factory
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DefaultNameFactory

    public abstract class AbstractFactory
extends Object
implements Factory
    Base class of factories provided in the Apache SIS library.
    Since:
    0.3 (derived from geotk-2.1)

    Defined in the sis-utility module (download)
    View source code for this class

      Creates a new factory.

      Citation getVendor()

    • Method Detail

      • getVendor

        public Citation getVendor()
        Returns the implementor of this factory, or null if unknown. The default implementation tries to fetch this information from the manifest associated to the package of this class.
        Specified by:
        getVendor in interface Factory
        Returns:
        The vendor for this factory implementation, or null if unknown.
        See Also:
        Package.getImplementationVendor()
